channel.title: Searching source
channel.description:
i'm searching a nearly empty source with about 15k or less lines if its a bit more its ok to
it need to have +magic base +working shops +working trade +working cases like the most of server of now for example door is id 1530 case 1530: addxp(1, 1); break:

item.title: Searching source
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

just grab a testscape source and empty it like i did, then recode everything useless from the ground up and people love it lol… and the stuff like mage, shops, and cases are easy, trade idk so much cause i never removed it

Read full topic

i’m searching a nearly empty source with about 15k or less lines
